column4: i've wrongly deleted /var/cache/apt and now my aptitude doesn't work..how can i solve this problem?
i've wrongly deleted /var/cache/apt and now my aptitude doesn't work..how can i solve this problem?
no one can help me? :(
i've wrongly deleted /var/cache/apt and now my aptitude doesn't work..how can i solve this problem?
sudo apt-get install aptitude
can't do it..because it tell me that aptitude is installed...or must I do "apt-get remove aptitude & apt-get install aptitude" ?
that will work too.
doesn't work... /var/cache/apt/archives/lock - open (2 No file or directory)
do you have synaptic open? Close it. Did you use the --reinstall?
i used --reinstall yes...and i don't have synaptic open...
sudo apt-get install aptitude? Gives you an error msg?
it tells me that aptitude is already installed...
les remove aptidute & reinstall it... 'sudo apt-get remove aptitude' then 'sudo apt-get install aptitude'
K, hold.
probably i can't remove it because is not working... :p
looking up the 'fix' option.
you mean aptitude fix ?
to fix aptitude with apt-get -f
not sure of the syntax though :/
doesn't work :(
Soory, I'm out of ideas.
